name: Autohackingusb
tagline: Automatically hacking usb stick (gets passwords + keylogger)
body:
###In this tutorial i show you my usb password recovery tool + keylogger.
For educational purposes only.

**1. Extrahate the USBhack1.0.zip on a usb stick. (download in description)**

**2. For getting the passwords.txt and starting the keylogger just start Start.bat**

**3. You can remove the usb now, keyylogger will run in background.**

**4. If you want the Keyloggs.txt put your usb stick back in and start get kellogs.bat**

#End.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
